body_html: @asimshankar I did build the code using the instructions in contrib/mpi/README.md. And then run the unit test mpirun -np 1 python mpi_allreduce_test.py under directory tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives. I did not set server = tf.train.Server(cluster, job_name="local", task_index=0, protocol='grpc+mpi').
body_text: @asimshankar I did build the code using the instructions in contrib/mpi/README.md. And then run the unit test mpirun -np 1 python mpi_allreduce_test.py under directory tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives. I did not set server = tf.train.Server(cluster, job_name="local", task_index=0, protocol='grpc+mpi').
body: @asimshankar I did build the code using the instructions in `contrib/mpi/README.md`. And then run the unit test `mpirun -np 1 python mpi_allreduce_test.py` under directory `tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives`. I did not set `server = tf.train.Server(cluster, job_name="local", task_index=0, protocol='grpc+mpi')`.
